rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Open foyer with wide entrance that embraces the Mediterranean style, complemented by natural stone finishes and subtle lighting.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Large open space featuring Mediterranean decor elements such as terracotta tiles, exposed wooden beams, and floor-to-ceiling windows that ensure ample natural light and cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Modern kitchenette with high efficiency appliances, integrated storage, and Mediterranean tiles. The area benefits from natural light through strategically placed windows ensuring a well-lit cooking environment.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Multi-functional living space designed for comfort and adaptability; includes built-in storage and versatile furniture arrangements. Incorporates a compact sleeping area that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the east-west axis.

openings.description: Provides an unobstructed view of the garden and exterior, ensuring maximum natural light penetration.
Large entrance door that integrates seamlessly with the architectural design and enhances natural ventilation through proper alignment.
